description.en: Firstly, let’s look at the circumstances. It’s the year 20XX— god has decided to take on a world relieving project where all of the population had to take a survey. The result, a demon lord was created, as well as another world. Only a few months remain until the adventurers are released. The game’s participants are chosen, if they are lawful or chaotic. The lawful will stay in their normal world, while the chaotic are taken to another world, forced to kill a demon lord. Will they be able to take the path, to take down the demon lord!!

altTitles.ja: ナノ魔神

description.en:
After being held in disdain and having his life put in danger, an orphan from the Demonic Cult, Cheon Yeo-Woon, has an unexpected visit from his descendant from the future who inserts a nano machine into Cheon Yeo-Woon's body, which drastically changes Cheon Yeo-Woon's life after its activation. The story of Cheon Yeo-Woon's journey of bypassing the Demonic Cult and rising to become the best martial artist has just begun.

description.ru:
Чен Еун — незаконнорожденный принц, появившийся на свет без единой частички Нейгуна. С самого раннего детства он находился под гнетом всеобщего отвращения. Весь забитый, с отсутствием какой-либо мотивации, год за годом Еун влачил свое жалкое существование. Ни на что не рассчитывая... и не претендуя.

Будучи изгоем, исконно презираемым шестью великими кланами, в один прекрасный день он оказался в окружении десятка подосланных убийц. Когда глаза практически застлала пелена белого света... и казалось, он уже начал теряться, проваливаясь в пучину... безграничного отчаяния, на горизонте возникла еле заметная фигура.

Неизвестный "потомок", снизошедший из будущего, в мгновение ока уничтожил всех врагов. Прошептав нечто невнятное, он подсадил в тело нашего героя какой-то странный предмет... наномашину. С этого момента все кардинально переменилось. Поселившийся где-то внутри искусственный интеллект дал его жизни невероятный толчок.

Больше не будет как прежде. Это... новая ветвь истории. Истории о парне, который бросил вызов небесам.

altTitles.ja: 信じていた仲間達にダンジョン奥地で殺されかけたがギフト『無限ガチャ』でレベル9999の仲間達を手に入れて元パーティーメンバーと世界に復讐&『ざまぁ!』します!

altTitles.en: Backwater Dungeon: My Party Tried to Kill Me, But Thanks to an Infinite Gacha I Got LVL 9999 Friends and Am Out For Revenge

I Was Almost Killed By The Teammates I trust Inside A Dungeon, And Gained A Gift Called [Infinite Gacha] And Level 9999 Comrades, And Now I'll Take Revenge Against My Former Teammates And The World, That's What You Get!
Backstabbed in a Backwater Dungeon: My Party Tried to Kill Me, But Thanks to an Infinite Gacha I Got LVL 9999 Friends and Am Out For Revenge

description.en:
There are six races in this world: human, beast, dragon, elf, dwarf, and demon. Humans are discriminated against and looked down on as the most inferior race. The "Gathering of Races" was a party with members from each race gathered to dispel such discrimination, but they also had a hidden purpose. They were ordered by the non-human countries to search for the human "Master," and take it to their own country.

Light, a human boy with the gift "Infinite Gacha," was welcomed into the Gathering of Races as he was suspected of being a Master. But in the end, their investigation showed that Light was not a Master. Just as Light was about to be killed by his teammates, he accidentally stepped on a transfer trap and was teleported to the lowest level of the dungeon.

In the deepest dungeon, he was attacked by a mythical level 1000 demon. In a desperate situation, Light used "Infinite Gacha" repeatedly. Luckily, he draws the SUR level 9999 card "Mei the Seeker Maid." Mei helped Light repel the demons and saved his life.

After finally escaping from the crisis, Light decides to take revenge on his former comrades. Mei advises him to remain in the dungeon and use Infinite Gacha to increase his number of trustworthy friends. Light agreed began building up the power necessary to oppose the non-human nations.

Three years later, Light had built the strongest nation in the depths of the dungeon. Once again, he will return to the surface to take revenge on his former comrades and search for the truth that nearly killed him.
___
[Alt Official English (US ONLY)](https://kmanga.kodansha.com/title/10040/episode/345702)
description.ja:
仲間に裏切られ、最凶のダンジョン『奈落』の底に突き落とされた少年・ライト。彼に残されたのはゴミだと思われたスキル『無限ガチャ』のみ！　最悪な状況から少年の逆転劇が始まる!!!　

9つの種族の平等を掲げ結成された冒険者パーティー『種族の集い』。荷物持ちの少年・ライトは、パーティーの仲間達に裏切られ最凶ダンジョン『奈落』の奥で命を狙われる…。絶体絶命の危機、ライトがすがるのは恩恵『無限ガチャ』!!!
description.pt-br: Um menino chamado Light é traído por seus companheiros e mergulha no abismo da masmorra mais perigosa do mundo. Tudo o que ele têm é a Bênção (habilidade) "Gacha Infinita", que ele pensou ser um lixo! Começa a vingança de um garoto na pior situação possível!

description.en: Even if a musician dies, he never dies. It's just covered. Singer-songwriter Kim Han-seok, who became a legend in Korea with just a guitar... Waking up as a college student in the streaming era 30 years after his death!

A place where you casually use blood or ma in your name, I lived in Murim for 7 years. I was miserable, and I did a lot of dirty things. But I had to do anything to survive. That's 'Nangin' Finally, I crossed the line and experienced death in a desire to become stronger. But when I opened my eyes, it was modern. The world has changed and we are connected to the fantasy world of Pangea?! And as a returner with the only class? Let's scratch the lottery tickets!
description.id: Tempat di mana Anda dengan santai menggunakan darah atau ma atas nama Anda, saya tinggal di Murim selama 7 tahun. Saya sengsara, dan saya melakukan banyak hal kotor. Tapi aku harus melakukan apapun untuk bertahan hidup. Itulah 'Nangin' Akhirnya, saya melewati batas dan mengalami kematian dalam keinginan untuk menjadi lebih kuat. Tapi ketika saya membuka mata saya, itu modern. Dunia telah berubah dan kita terhubung dengan dunia fantasi Pangaea?! Dan sebagai pengembalian dengan satu-satunya kelas? Mari gores tiket lotere!

description.en:
Vino, a member of the A-class adventurer party "Assault," is a potion user, the weakest and lowest level job.

He meets a beautiful swordsman named Canadia, who is known as the God of Death.
He was kicked out of the party and nearly died in a monster attack, but Vino awakened by chance with the single-minded desire to protect her!

He discovered his own strong shoulders and a new way to use potions, even throwing potions to blast monsters to pieces.

Then their adventure began, but at the same time Canadia started to run amok!

An adventure tale with the strongest pushover wife, it begins!

---

**Character Designer:** [Nitaka](https://mangadex.org/author/80544dac-562c-47ec-abb8-35f07ec2bd12)

[Alt Official Raw (NicoNico Manga)](https://manga.nicovideo.jp/comic/54976)
description.ja:
Ａ級冒険者パーティ【アサルト】のメンバー・ヴィーノは、最弱にして最底辺職であるポーション使い。

そんな彼が出会ったのは『死神』と呼ばれる美しい剣士カナディアだった。
パーティから追い出され、モンスターの襲撃で死にかけたヴィーノが彼女を守りたい一心で偶然覚醒！

ポーションを投げてモンスターを爆散させるほどの自らの強肩ぶりと、ポーションの新たな使用法に気付く。

それから二人の冒険が始まったのだが……同時にカナディアの暴走も始まってしまう！？
最強の押しかけ嫁と行く冒険譚、開幕！

title.en: I Became the Youngest Member of Top Idol

altTitles.pt-br: Meu Retorno Como O Membro Mais Jovem

description.en: “25…that’s too old to become an idol.” Do Seohan, who got eliminated from the successful idol survival audition program ‘Stardust Project’. Giving up his dreams, he is trying to find his way working part-time jobs. When all of a sudden, he wakes up 8 years in the past after an accident. Right before the ‘Stardust Project’ started! As the youngest (but most experienced), can he make it to the final lineup this time?
description.id: Do Seohan, yang gagal dalam idol survival show terkenal “Stardust Project”, selalu dibayang-bayangi oleh mimpi masa lalunya. Tak pernah meraih kesuksesan, Seohan hanya bisa bekerja sambilan untuk melewati hari-harinya. Namun, akibat sebuah kejadian yang menimpanya, tiba-tiba ia terbangun dan kembali ke 8 tahun lalu, tepat sebelum “Stardust Project” dimulai! Jiwanya 8 tahun lebih tua dari kontestan lainnya, tapi sekarang ia yang termuda di antara mereka. Apakah kali ini Seohan akan berhasil debut sebagai idol?
description.ko:
"25살…그거 아이돌은 못하는 나이잖아요."
유명 서바이벌 아이돌 오디션 '스타더스트 프로젝트'에서 탈락했던 도서한.
꿈에 미련은 못버리고 현실과 타협한 채 알바를 전전하는데…눈을 떠보니 8년 전으로 돌아왔다.
그것도 '스타더스트 프로젝트'를 시작하기 직전으로!
막내가 된 (영혼만은) 최고 연장자, 이번에는 오디션에 합격해 아이돌 멤버가 될 수 있을까?
description.pt-br: Do Seohan, que fracassou no famoso programa de sobrevivência de idols "Stardust Project", é sempre assombrado por seus sonhos do passado. Sem nunca ter alcançado o sucesso, Seohan só consegue trabalhar em empregos de meio período para passar seus dias. No entanto, devido a um incidente que lhe aconteceu, ele acordou de repente e voltou a 8 anos atrás, logo antes do início do "Stardust Project"! Sua alma é 8 anos mais velha que a dos outros participantes, mas agora ele é o mais jovem entre eles. Será que Seohan conseguirá debutar como idol desta vez?

title.en: Together With the Gods of Music

description.en:
A producer who had no talent but wanted to make it as a singer.
Death came on what he thought was his last chance, but the music gods didn't turn their backs on him.

-If the music gods don't abandon you, can you really do it?

With the gods of music, change began.
description.ko:
재능은 없지만 가수로 성공하고 싶었던 프로듀서.
마지막 기회라고 생각했던 날 찾아온 죽음, 그러나 음악의 신들은 그를 외면하지 않았다.

-음악의 신들이 너를 버리지 않는다면, 정말 할 수 있겠나?

음악의 신들과 함께 변화는 시작되었다.

title.en: "SHOPSKILL" Sae Areba, Dungeon ka Sita Sekaidemo Rakusyou da: Hakugai Sareta Shounen no Saikyou Zamaa Life

altTitles.ja: 『ショップ』スキルさえあれば、ダンジョン化した世界でも楽勝だ ～迫害された少年の最強ざまぁライフ～

altTitles.es-la: Con mi Habilidad "Tienda", es Fácil Conquistar un Mundo de Mazmorras.

altTitles.en: As Long as I Have the [Shop] Skill, I'll Have an Easy Life Even in a World That Has Been Transformed Into a Dungeon!

altTitles.ja-ro: “Shop” Skill Sae Areba, Dungeon-ka Shita Sekai Demo Rakushou da

description.en: High school student Boji Nichiro is isolated from the rest of the world due to fierce bullying. One day, however, the world is transformed by the "dungeonisation" phenomenon! In the midst of the chaos, Nichiro awakens the unique skill "Shop". It was an out-of-the-box skill that allowed him to buy everything from food and daily necessities to unrealistic items! The start of a painful and "wacky" modern fantasy from "Shosetsu-kaerou"!
description.ja: 壮絶なイジメを受け、孤立していた高校生・坊地日呂。だが、ある日《ダンジョン化》現象により世界は一変する！　混乱の中、日呂に覚醒したユニークスキル『ショップ』。それは、食料や日用品から非現実的なアイテムまでなんでも買える規格外のスキルだった――！　“小説家になろう”発痛快“ざまぁ”の現代ファンタジー開幕!!
description.es-la: Hiro es un estudiante que no confía en nadie. Él se ve envuelto en una catastrofe mundial. La aparición de monstruos convirtió al mundo en una mazmorra y Hiro tendrá que usar su nueva habilidad para sobrevivir.

description.en: The mysterious murderers who commit crimes frequently hide in the dark and stalk their prey silently! They may also stroll past innocent passers-by indifferently… or put up a kind smile, but wave a butcher's knife at the next moment! There's another possibility that… You're that demon…

Shin Yoomyeong is an unknown actor who kept on chasing his dream despite playing minor roles for 15 years because of his weak presence. One day, he meets the Acting Spirit, Yeonghwi, who he signs a contract with, and begins to shine in his career. In fact, he was always an acting genius,  but he was overshadowed by his weak presence. He creates a perfect character for every work he takes and slowly raises to stardom. However, Yeonghwi, who he saw as his benefactor, starts to seem suspicious…

altTitles.ja: ギミック！

altTitles.zh: 神乎其技 - 特效化妝師

description.en: Kohei Nagase is an prodigy special effects artist. He and pro stuntman, Shingo Kannazuki, form Studio Gimmick. Together, they help people in need of Studio Gimmick's exceptional services. These people's problems are often able to be solved with Kohei's stunning special effects skills.

title.en: Saikyou Onmyouji no Isekai Tenseiki ~Geboku no Youkaidomo ni Kurabete Monster ga Yowaisugirundaga~

altTitles.en: The Reincarnation of the Strongest Exorcist in Another World

altTitles.ja: 最強陰陽師の異世界転生記 ～下僕の妖怪どもに比べてモンスターが弱すぎるんだが～

altTitles.ja-ro: Saikyou Onmyouji no Isekai Tensei-ki ~Geboku no Youkai-domo ni Kurabete Monster ga Yowasugiru n da ga~

altTitles.zh-hk: 最強陰陽師的異世界轉生記 ～怪物比我的下僕妖怪弱太多了～

altTitles.zh: 最强阴阳师的异世界转生记

altTitles.en: The Reincarnation of the Strongest Onmyoji ~ These Monsters Are Too Weak Compared to My Youkai~

description.en:
Haruyoshi Kuga’s power as the strongest exorcist is all for naught when he is betrayed by his closest ally. With his dying breath, he casts the secret Spell of Reincarnation — when he next opens his eyes, he finds himself in a different world altogether, reincarnated as Seika Lamprogue, the son of a family of magic scholars!

He quickly learns that the magic in this new world is quite unlike the sorcery he learned in his past life and that he can’t use it. Fortunately for him, with his mastery of curses and the hordes of youkai at his disposal, he doesn’t need to. 

Haruyoshi (now Seika) is determined not to repeat his past mistakes in his second life by smartly laying low and avoiding flaunting his power. Yet accomplishing his goals and without drawing attention to himself proves to be easier said than done — will his powers be enough to live a happy life?! 

---

[Official English Light Novel](https://j-novel.club/series/the-reincarnation-of-the-strongest-exorcist-in-another-world)

altTitles.en: Finding Avalon: The Quest of a Chaosbringer

altTitles.ja: 災悪のアヴァロン
災悪のアヴァロン～ゲーム最弱の悪役デブに転移したけど、俺だけ“やせれば強くてニューゲーム”な世界だったので、最速レベルアップ＆破滅フラグ回避で影の英雄を目指します～

description.en:
The main character loves the MMORPG game called Dan-Ex. During one particular day, a beta test event was announced, and he managed to beat it.
In exchange for clearing the event, he was granted permission to try the beta test server.
Forcing to choose different avatar and skill as the system doesn't allow his own, he eventually settled on random. However, he is transferred to a place where, as expected, he finds a fat, villainous mob character...!

Having suffered several setbacks in her attempt to be a voice actor, Chi Yu no longer dares to bring up her hobby of dubbing in front of others. Instead, she covertly tunes in to voice drama broadcasts on Lily Radio. One day, during a public lecture at her university, she discovers that Yu Chen from the neighboring college shares a strikingly similar voice to the host of Lily Radio.

Tang Ran is a sunny and cheerful little fox. In order to graduate from the monster school, she transformed into a human college student and wanted to seduce a human to fall in love with her. However, what she didn't know was that the cold-hearted human female professor she fell in love with, Su Qingci, was actually...? A lie requires countless other lies to cover it up. To make the other person fall in love with them first, the fox will always tell "lies".

altTitles.ja: 絶代武神～伝説の始まり～

description.en:
On the verge of death, I was saved by a group of elderly demon – level existences at the apex of cultivation. But I, Yeon-gang had too much potential in martial arts, and alas was kidnapped and forced to become their disciple… Join me as I desperately try my best to escape their grasp, and enter the world of Murim!

description.ja:
武林世家である四川唐門でこき使われあげくに捨てられた少年・燕康。 自称「絶世達人」の老人3人組に拾われ弟子になるも、修行と言う名の家事ばかり！ やっと武功を教えてもらうことになるも、基本の以気御剣（いきごけん）”さえできなかった！ 武神の伝説は始まったばかり…！

은거고수 삼인방 비돈, 독안, 광두! 

그들이 제자를 키우기 시작한다.

"너는 왜 가장 기본인 이기어검조차 못하냐?"


기본이나 다름없는 이기어검도 못해서 구박받는 제자 소연강!

소연강과 세사부의 전설이 시작된다!

적하 작가의 명작 무협 소설 <절대무신>이 웹툰으로 돌아왔다!

Три великих мастера-затворника: Бидон, Тоган и Кванду, - взяли на воспитание ученика по имени Со Ён Ган.

-Почему ты не можешь освоить элементарные приёмы с мечом?

Вот так начинается история об ученике-неудачнике - Со Ён Гане.

description.en: Uma Musume: Cinderella Gray is a spin-off title of the Uma Musume project by Cygames. It follows Oguri Cap through her time at Kasamatsu Training Center Academy and on her journey of becoming a legendary horse girl.
description.ja: 寂れたカサマツの地に現れた、ひとりの灰被りの少女。後に“怪物”と呼ばれるその少女は、どこを目指して疾るのか――。地方から中央の伝説へ。
description.vi: Uma Musume: Cinderella Gray là một manga spin-off của series Uma Musume. Câu chuyện kể về Oguri Cap và cuộc hành trình trở thành một Mã Nương huyền thoại của cô.

altTitles.es: El esclavo de la élite de soldados de Mato

altTitles.en: Slave of the Magic Capital's Elite Troops

altTitles.ja: 魔都精兵のスレイブ

description.en:
The demon-filled dimension known as "Mato" has opened to threaten humanity, and a type of "peach" tree that grows there yields fruit that confers special powers to those who eat it, giving humanity a fighting chance, but this only works for women. As such, as protectors of humanity, women rise in social status while men are relegated to second-class citizens scraping for basic occupation and acknowledgment.   
  
Cue Yuuki Wakura, a domestically crafty and laborious high school senior whose older sister was taken during a Mato event 5 years before; while lamenting the hardships of the life ahead of him, an event opens before him, and while being rescued from demons by Captain Kyouka of the Anti-Demon Corps, she confers him powers as her "slave" and turns him into a mighty beast mount that mows down the demons.   
  
However, there is a surprising price to pay for being her "slave"… and it's not him who has to pay it.
description.fr:
La dimension démoniaque connue sous le nom de "Mato" s'est ouverte pour menacer l'humanité, et une sorte de "pêcher" qui y pousse donne des fruits qui confèrent des pouvoirs spéciaux à ceux qui les mangent, donnant à l'humanité une chance de se battre, mais cela ne fonctionne que pour les femmes. Ainsi, en tant que protectrices de l'humanité, les femmes gagnent en statut social tandis que les hommes sont relégués à des citoyens de seconde zone qui se battent pour une occupation et une reconnaissance de base.  
  
Cue Yuuki Wakura, une lycéenne rusée et laborieuse dont la sœur aînée a été enlevée lors d'un événement du Mato 5 ans auparavant ; alors qu'elle se lamente sur les difficultés de la vie qui l'attend, un événement s'ouvre devant elle, et alors qu'elle est sauvée des démons par le capitaine Kyouka du Corps Anti-Démon, elle lui confère ses pouvoirs d'"esclave" et le transforme en un puissant monticule animal qui fauche les démons.  
  
Cependant, il y a un prix surprenant à payer pour être son "esclave"… et ce n'est pas lui qui doit le payer.  


---

**Links:**  
- [Artist's Twitter](https://twitter.com/takemura4hey/)
description.ru:
Эта боевая фентезийная манга повествует о нескольких героинях, что защищают людей в альтернативном пространстве, именуемом Мато (Город Демонов).  


---
description.pt-br:
A dimensão cheia de demônios conhecida como "Mato" se abriu para ameaçar a humanidade, e uma espécie de "pessegueiro" que ali cresce produz frutos que conferem poderes especiais a quem os come, dando à humanidade uma chance de lutar, mas isso só funciona para mulheres. Como tal, como protetoras da humanidade, as mulheres ascendem no estatuto social, enquanto os homens são relegados a cidadãos de segunda classe, em busca de uma ocupação básica e de reconhecimento.

 Yuuki Wakura é um estudante do último ano do ensino médio, astuto e trabalhoso, cuja irmã mais velha foi raptada durante um evento em Mato, 5 anos antes; enquanto lamenta as dificuldades da vida que tem pela frente, um evento se abre diante dele, e ao ser resgatado dos demônios pela Capitã Kyouka do Corpo Anti-Demônio, ela confere a ele poderes como seu "escravo" e o transforma em uma poderosa montaria bestial. que destrói os demônios.

No entanto, há um preço surpreendente a pagar por ele ser seu “escravo”… e não é ele quem tem que pagar.

title.en: In This Life, the Greatest Star in the Universe

altTitles.en: I'm Going to Be a Big Star

description.en: Sun Woo-joo, an aspiring idol with shining talent, dedication, and passion, had only one shortcoming: "dancing." Having to give up on his lifelong dream of becoming an idol due to this one flaw, he was preparing for a different path in life when a miracle suddenly appeared! "I'll become a superstar brighter than anyone." His once lacking dance skills were no longer a problem. The UV Starship. Five perfectly prepared idols are finally ready with everything they need. A monstrous rookie is about to debut in the entertainment industry! Presenting 'The New Black.' This life, he's destined to be a cosmic superstar!

To meet his dead parents again, Hong Bin made a deal with the Baseball Fairy, who agreed to return him to the past if he achieved 3,000 career hits as a baseball player. And at the age of 40, Bin the baseball legend hits his last ball and goes back in time. After reuniting with his family, Bin decides to pursue his old dream of joining the major league. The only issue is that he's lost all his old skills as a pro! But will his past experiences be enough to help this legend fulfill his new goal?

title.en: The Artistic Genius of Music Is the Reincarnation of Paganini

altTitles.en: High School Musical Genius Is Paganini Reincarnated

description.en: The Rebirth of Paganini, Joo-won Moon. He was once a gifted violinist, but due to an injury, he gradually distanced himself from music and lived the life of a regular high school student. “I don’t pursue music.” However, perhaps the irony of fate… Joo-won Moon accidentally transferred to the music class of an arts high school, he picked up the violin… Will Joo-won Moon be able to overcome his psychological trauma? And is there a chance for him to be reborn as a true violinist?

altTitles.ru: Военный раб, ставший мастером боевых искусств

description.en:
The Murim Warring States period is where only the strong survives. This is the war slave Cheong Gwang and Myeong-Wol’s Murim Survival Story.

---

- [Original Webtoon <kakao>](https://page.kakao.com/home?seriesId=59153035)
description.ko:
강자만이 살아남는 무림전국시대.
전쟁노예 천광과 중원제일의 기생 명월의
무림 생존기를 그린 가족 무협 액션 드라마.

---

- [Original Webtoon <kakao>](https://page.kakao.com/home?seriesId=59153035)
description.ru:
Главный герой - Чон Гван, будучи ребенком, попадает в военное рабство. Больше десяти лет он не видел своего отца и сестренку. Согласно уговору с преемником одной из сильнейших гильдий, он должен принести голову двадцати мастеров боевых искусств, и только тогда ему даруют свободу. Чон Гван жил мыслью о скором возвращении домой, однако... его обманули. Тогда он решает сбежать...

---

- [Original Webtoon <kakao>](https://page.kakao.com/home?seriesId=59153035)

altTitles.ja: 死にたがりの復讐者

description.en: A high school girl, Shizuku, who despairs of living after being bullied at school and sexually abused at home, attempts to commit suicide at a deserted shrine, where she is cursed with immortality by an eerie raven. Unable to even die, Shizuku decides to use her immortal body to inflict deathly retribution on her tormentors. A revenge drama about a high school girl with a different power in her hands!
description.ja: 学校ではいじめ、家庭では性的虐待を受けて生きることに絶望した女子高生・雫は寂れた神社で自殺を図るが、そこで雫は不気味な烏に不死の呪いをかけられる。死ぬことすらできなくなった雫は、不死のからだを使っていじめた奴らに死の報復を与えると決意する。異能を手にした女子高生の復讐劇!

altTitles.en: I Will Live as an Actor

altTitles.ja: 役者として生きる

description.en: To escape a life of poverty, Jang Youngkuk aspired to be a famous actor. And he succeeds... at the cost of his mother's life. Upon proceeding to take his own out of despair, Youngkuk miraculously returns to his childhood. With a second chance to make things right, he swears to abandon acting and be the good son he never was. However, when financial troubles begin to haunt Youngkuk and his mother, he discovers that he may have no choice but to return to the set for one last take.

title.en: Hell Mode: Yarikomi Suki no Gamer wa Hai Settei no Isekai de Musou Suru

altTitles.en: Hell Mode: The Hardcore Gamer Dominates in Another World with Garbage Balancing

altTitles.ja: ヘルモード ～やり込み好きのゲーマーは廃設定の異世界で無双する～ はじまりの召喚士

description.en:
Yamada Kenichi, a single, 35-year-old businessman, has spent the majority of his adult life playing every MMORPG to hit the market.

Tired of the constant cycle of repetitive, newbie-centric gameplay, he is immediately drawn in by the promise of a new game that, on top of being never-ending, offers up a "Hell Mode" — a difficulty level that makes it nigh impossible to level up but also promises uncapped growth potential.

Upon selecting the newly released Summoner class, Kenichi finds himself reborn as Allen, an infant in a serf family, with nothing but his wits and old memories to guide him. Allen works diligently to level himself up despite Hell Mode requiring vast amounts of experience between levels. In doing so, he hopes to uncover the secrets the Summoner class holds.

All the while, he dedicates himself to freeing his new family from serfdom.
description.ja: 「終わらないゲームにあなたを招待します。 だって?」 健一が偶然たどり着いたタイトルのない謎のネットゲーム。 難易度設定画面で迷わず最高難易度『ヘルモード』を選ぶと、異世界の農奴へと転生してしまった! 少年「アレン」へと転生した健一は、謎の多い職業「召喚士」を使いこなしながら、 異世界で最強への道を手探りで歩み始めるが――。
description.pt-br: "Você será convocado para o mundo de um jogo sem fim?' Um dia, estava procurando um novo jogo, quando de repente vi aquele anúncio. Depois de escolher o modo mais difícil do jogo, 'modo inferno', de repente reencarnei em um novo mundo como um lavrador. Como um menino chamado Allen, comecei minha jornada em outro mundo com a maior dificuldade, superando todos os desafios para alcançar o maior título do jogo "Summoner" . ----- O romance promissor de 1º grau da revista 'Vamos nos tornar um escritor ', uma história extremamente aguardada.

altTitles.ja: 茜部先生は照れ知らず

description.en:
Kouki Sakieda is an assistant for Akira Akanabe, a manga artist he admires, who always tries to praise him in some way. Sakieda is worried that he will end up falling in love with her if this situation continues. Then Akanabe unexpectedly asks him to go out with her... 

The story depicts the daily life of Akanabe-sensei, who lavishes praise on Sakieda without embarrassment, and Sakieda, who tries to accept it all gracefully.
description.ja: 『崎枝君ってさ私のこと好き？』　憧れの漫画家・茜部アキラのもとでアシスタントとして働く崎枝コウキ。憧れが次第に恋心へと変わっていたある日、まさかの両想いであることがわかり、なんと二人は恋人同士に！　しかし、茜部先生は思った事を口にしちゃう上に照れ知らずで、コウキを褒め殺してくる！
description.pt-br:
Kouki Sakieda é assistente de Akira Akanabe, uma mangaká que ele admira. Ela sempre tenta elogiá-lo de alguma forma. Sakieda está preocupado que possa acabar se apaixonando por ela se essa situação continuar. Então, inesperadamente, Akanabe o convida para sair...
A história retrata o dia a dia da Sensei Akanabe, que distribui elogios a Sakieda sem qualquer constrangimento, e de Sakieda, que tenta aceitar tudo com elegância.

description.en: Jongli Chu, a warrior of the Death Heavenly Sect who killed Hwang Jung to avenge his older brother. In order to avoid the pursuit of Death Heavenly Sect, he looked to an assassin of the Death Soul Agency, Crimson Assassin, for help and got swept into a huge mess known as the Obliteration. In order to escape the shadow of the Obliteration, he had no choice but to become a legendary Death God! Can Jong Lichu become a Death God and find freedom in the stifling rules created by the orthodox sects?

For the sake of her one and only family member, her younger brother, Kang Han; older sister Kang Hanni works hard everyday to earn money. One day, she is informed by his school that if he misses one more day of attendance, he will be expelled. However, after she reprimands him harshly, he runs away from the house. In order to prevent his expulsion, the older sister must dress-up and impersonate as her younger brother and attend school.
description.ko:
하나 뿐인 가족, 동생 '강한'을 책임지기 위해 열심히 일하는 가장이자 누나 '강하니', 어느 날  동생의 학교에서 장기무단 결석으로 퇴학 조치 통보를 받게 된다. 
하지만 과도한 훈육으로 동생은 집을 나가버리고, 결국 퇴학을 면하기 위해 어쩔 수 없이 누나가 동생으로 변장하고 등교하게 되는데..

description.en:
Zegar is a hero who avoids problems at all costs. The only thing he fears are demonic swords, evil weapons that try to possess their wielders. But for some reason, they don't stop chasing him and sticking to him.

Zegar just wanted to live a quiet life, doing small missions and staying out of trouble. But, unintentionally, he becomes the center of several events that shake the fantastic continent.

“Ah… Damn.”

He regrets it, but it's too late. If he can't run away, he only has one option: cut his enemies with demonic swords!

altTitles.vi: Bị Che Khuất Bởi Ánh Mặt Trời Lặn
Tà dương trong đôi mắt vô hồn

altTitles.ru: Закат, отражённый в её ледяном взгляде

description.en:
The witch Hildegar, who received the blessing of the Sun Goddess Karia, is known far and wide for her fearsome reputation.  
The Northerner Elkin, who lost his homeland, chases after the witch towards a nameless castle…
description.ko:
태양의 신 카리야의 가호를 받은 마녀 '힐데가르'.
고향을 잃은 북부인 '에르킨'은 마녀를 쫓아 이름 없는 성으로 향한다.

title.en: The Dang Clan’s Swordmaster Heir Just Wants a Normal Life

altTitles.en: Becoming the Swordmaster Rank Young Lord of the Sichuan Tang Family
He Became the Head of the Four Heavenly Dang Family
Becoming the Sacheon Dang's Swordsmaster-Rank Young Lord
Became a swordsman-level Sogami of the Sacheondang family

description.en: The Dang clan of Sacheon, once renowned for its poison and hidden weapons, is now on the path to its demise. That is, until Yeonmyeung Dang, an outcast boy of the clan, awakens by recollecting the memories of his past life as the 'god of swords' who devoted his life to mastering the sword. Will the boy be able to protect his family and fulfill his dream of living a normal life?
description.ko:
독과 암기의 명가였지만 지금은 몰락해버린 사천당가.
그곳에서 태어난 당연명은 문득 검에 미쳐 살며
검신의 경지에 이르렀던 전생을 각성한다.

'이번 생은 평범하게 살고 싶다.'

평범하게 살려면, 역시 검술 실력은 숨겨야겠지.
그런데 방해하는 것들이 너무 많다.

altTitles.ja: クベーラ

description.en:
Gods with everlasting lives. Sura who possess unrivaled power. And humans, caught helplessly in-between.  
When Kubera's peaceful village meets its fiery end, a mysterious magician named Asha comes to her rescue. Together they begin a journey in search of answers and revenge. Meanwhile across the realms, a web of entwined fates is growing tighter. One by one the other players of the game will emerge, each with their own agenda to pursue.  
At the center of this maelstrom stands Kubera, the girl with a god's name. Will this sixteen-year-old be the salvation of the world or its destruction?
description.it:
Dei immortali. Sura dai poteri impareggiabili. E gli umani, che si ergono fra loro impotenti.  
Quando il pacifico villaggio di Kubera incontra la sua fine, una misteriosa maga di nome Asha accorre in suo soccorso. Insieme intraprendono un viaggio in cerca di risposte e vendetta. Mentre attraversano il regno, una rete di destini intersecati sta nascendo… Una ad una le altre pedine della scacchiera emergono, ognuna all'inseguimento dei propri obiettivi.  
Al centro di quest'uragano si trova Kubera, la ragazza con il nome di un Dio. Questa sedicenne sarà la salvatrice di questo mondo… o la sua distruttrice?
description.pl:
Bogowie z nieśmiertelnymi żywotami  
Asury z niepojętą mocą  
I ludzie, pomiędzy nimi.  
Gdy wioska Kubery zostaje zniszczona, tajemniczy mag przychodzi jej na ratunek. Razem wyruszają w podróż w poszukiwaniu odpowiedzi i zemsty. Tymczasem pomiędzy wymiarami pajęczyna przeznaczenia coraz ciaśniej zaciska się… Jeden po drugim nowi gracze wkraczają na scenę, mając swoje własne powody. Historia młodej dziewczyny, która traci wszystko i zaczyna żyć zemstą.

altTitles.ja: 異世界居酒屋｢げん｣

description.en:
There's this pub (Izakaya) called " Gen" that was supposed to be in a certain place in the Kanto region of Japan.  
After opening the door one day, it was found to be connected to the city of Parisia, the Capital of the Eastern Kingdom...   
Individual residents from a foreign world such as fallen monks, warriors, noble female knight, daughters of noisy famous aristocrats, etc. all visited the peculiar izakaya which they've never seen before, and gradually they'll become fans of the dishes...  
A foreign world gourmet fantasy has finally started!  
  
***From the same author of Isekai Izakaya "Nobu", which takes place in Kyoto.**
description.ja: 『異世界居酒屋「のぶ」』の作者・蝉川夏哉による原作書き下ろしのスピンオフ作品。次なる世界は異世界・東王国、王都パリシィア!王都パリシィアでも、異世界の住人たちは、初めて見る日本の居酒屋料理に戸惑いながらも舌鼓を打ち……。

description.en: A child who was treated like a dog and trained in my childhood has reappeared as a subordinate with a striking appearance. No matter how much I push him away, Shin Geonwoo, with his gentle, dog-like eyes, constantly gets on my nerves."I remembered your scent wherever I went. Your scent is still sweet, Team Leader. ""What do you want from me? Just leave me alone. ""Keep me by your side, like before. I've been waiting for you for a long time."

Woo Jae was raised by his mother who was obsessed with shamanism. The day Woojae got tired of her mother's obssession, he refused to pray for the first time. His mother, on the other hand, died that day on a car accident. Suffering from guilt, Woo Jae began to suffer from a strange symptoms of seeing futile things, sleeping and having nightmares from time to time, and wonders whether he should visit the shaman again. At that time, a man calls himself Imoogi and suggests that he can cure Woo Jae's symptoms.

But... is the treatment method includes skinship?
Can I trust this man?
description.ko:
무속 신앙에 광적으로 집착하는 어머니 밑에서 자란 우재.

그와 관련된 일이라면 지긋지긋해진 우재가 처음으로 굿을 거부한 날, 교통사고로 어머니가 세상을 떠난다. 죄책감에 괴로워하던 우재는 헛것을 보거나 시시때때로 잠들고 악몽을 꾸는 기묘한 증상을 겪기 시작하고, 다시 무당을 찾아가야 할지 고민한다.

그때, 한 남자가 스스로를 이무기라 칭하며 나타나 우재의 증상을 낫게 해줄 수 있다며 제안해온다.

description.en: Is he crazy? Or just the typical attention seeker? Lee Kwang-Jin, who doesn't understand the difference in people, and his Master Kwak No who's the one helping him to understand the differences of people. A warm human story of a student and his Master.
description.ko:
미친놈인가?
아니면 흔한 관심종자인가?

사람의 다름을 이해 못 하는 제자 이강진.
그리고 그걸 이해시켜주고자 하는 스승 곽노.
두 사제師弟의 따뜻한 휴먼스토리.

description.en: A salaryman summons Astaroth, a Prince of Hell, to help him stop getting bullied at work.

title.en: Act Like a Boss Monster, Mr. Swallow!

altTitles.ru: Ведите себя как подобает боссу подземелья, господин Сваллоу!

altTitles.en: The Unbeatable Dungeon's Lazy Boss Monster
Mr Devourer, Please Act Like a Final Boss

altTitles.es-la: Actúe como un jefecito final, Sr. devorador

description.en:
The Primordial Core’s an unconquerable dungeon, the lair of the most powerful monster ever to exist, the Original Monster, the incarnation of evil — Swallow... who happens to be a lazy boss monster who just wants to sleep.

Taking care of this lazy bum is Renee, a homunculus maid whose obsession with Swallow knows no bounds. At this point, the only one keeping the dungeon running is Patrick, the last brain cell of the bunch — and he’s a skeleton!

Will Mr. Swallow get any rest amid all this chaos?

altTitles.ja: ヤンキーJKクズハナちゃん

altTitles.pt-br: Garota Delinquente Do Ensino Médio KuzuHana-chan

description.en:
At the beginning of the academic year, Saotome Hodaka enrolls into Moteshiro Prefectural High School, a former all-girls school that had recently integrated, but discovers it has a male to female ratio of 1:359! 

While most might think of this as a paradise, the majority of the students are delinquents and Saotome immediately finds himself being extorted by some of the more aggressive girls. However, he is inadvertently saved by Hanako Kuzuryu, a beautiful delinquent who just wants to be left alone.

Is this the start of a new friendship? And how will Saotome's life unfold in a school full of troublesome women?
description.fr:
Au début de l'année scolaire, Saotome Hodaka intègre le lycée préfectoral de Moteshiro, ancien établissement réservé aux filles et récemment devenu mixte. Il découvre rapidement que le ratio garçons/filles est de 1:359 !

Bien que cela puisse sembler être un paradis pour certains, la majorité des élèves sont des délinquantes, et Saotome se retrouve aussitôt extorqué par certaines des filles les plus agressives. Par chance, il est sauvé malgré lui par Hanako Kuzuryu, une belle délinquante qui aspire seulement à être laissée en paix.

Est-ce le début d'une nouvelle amitié ? Comment la vie de Saotome évoluera-t-elle dans une école pleine de filles turbulentes ?
description.ja:
男女比率1対359!!　359人の女子高生にいじられまくり!!　つらたんハーレム学園ラブコメ!!　コワかわ最強ヒロイン爆誕!!
四方八方ギャルだらけな県立茂手城高校に入学した黒一点・早乙女穂高は、ヤンキーJK・九頭竜華子にピンチを救われて…!?
description.pt-br:
Uma proporção de homem para mulher de 1:359?!

Saotome-kun é admitido em uma escola cheia de gyarus e conhece uma garota delinqüente chamada Hanako Kuzuryu.

altTitles.ja: 魔弾の銃士

altTitles.th: สไนเปอร์กระสุนเวท

description.en:
Paraplegic ex-sniper Ha Yiha is getting a fresh start in the VR game “Middle Earth.” He hopes to become a powerful player and earn enough money to afford surgery, but there’s a small problem… an untimely logout leaves him playing as a musketeer, the game’s most ineffective class. Luckily, he’s able to use his real-life sharpshooting skills to take musketeering to new heights. As his unprecedented progress turns heads and prompts new quests, Yiha thinks he’s got a shot at success, but he may have just landed himself directly in danger’s sights.

description.ja:
いつも完璧を勝ち取る吉田ローガン。 しかし、不意の事故により下半身不随の障害を負い、社会から捨てられる。 絶望に陥った彼に訪れた、革命的なVRゲーム「ミドルアース」による新しい世界が始まる。 だが、とあるトラブルによりキャラクター選びを大間違い！一番能力の低い「マスケット銃士」を選んでしまう！ “クッソ…俺は他の奴と違う。俺が本物のマスケット銃の力を見せてやる！”

---
- [Original Webtoon <Webtoon kakao>](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EB%A7%88%ED%83%84%EC%9D%98-%EC%82%AC%EC%88%98/2470)

- [Official Thai Translation](https://th.kakaowebtoon.com/content/%E0%B8%AA%E0%B9%84%E0%B8%99%E0%B9%80%E0%B8%9B%E0%B8%AD%E0%B8%A3%E0%B9%8C%E0%B8%81%E0%B8%A3%E0%B8%B0%E0%B8%AA%E0%B8%B8%E0%B8%99%E0%B9%80%E0%B8%A7%E0%B8%97/179)
description.ko:
"하 중사, 이 미친놈아. 또 만발인 거 알아?"

이제 말뚝 박을 일만 남은 명사수 부사관 하이하.
그러나 불의의 사고로 하반신을 못 쓰게 되어 사회로 내쳐졌다.
절망에 빠져있던 그에게 혁명적인 VR 게임 [미들 어스]가 새로운 삶을 선사한다.
가상현실 게임인 [미들 어스]에서 획득한 돈은 현실의 돈이 된다!

하지만 캐릭터 생성 때 가장 성능이 낮은 캐릭터를 고르게 되는 바람에 망하게 생겼다!

"난 다르다. 이것이 내 마지막이야!"

흑색화약, 쇠구슬, 꼬질대. 진짜 '머스킷티어'가 무엇인지 보여주마!

---
- [Original Webtoon <Webtoon kakao>](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EB%A7%88%ED%83%84%EC%9D%98-%EC%82%AC%EC%88%98/2470)

- [Official Japanese Translation](https://piccoma.com/web/product/69064)

- [Official Thai Translation](https://th.kakaowebtoon.com/content/%E0%B8%AA%E0%B9%84%E0%B8%99%E0%B9%80%E0%B8%9B%E0%B8%AD%E0%B8%A3%E0%B9%8C%E0%B8%81%E0%B8%A3%E0%B8%B0%E0%B8%AA%E0%B8%B8%E0%B8%99%E0%B9%80%E0%B8%A7%E0%B8%97/179)
description.ru:
Сериал про гиперреалистичную фэнтезийную игру! «Сержант Ха, ты сумасшедший ублюдок. Ты выстрелил еще раз в пулю?» Меткий стрелок Ха ЛиХа просто хотел навсегда стать частью армии. Однако из-за несчастного случая он стал парализованным и был отброшен обратно в общество. Революционная игра VR [Средиземье] подарила ему новую жизнь. Деньги, полученные в [Средиземье], имеют реальную ценность! Тем не менее, он испортил свой шанс, выбрав персонажа самого низкого уровня! «Я не такой, как другие. Это все, что у меня есть». Черный порох, железные шары и шомполы ... Я вам всем покажу, что такое настоящий «мушкетер»!

---
- [Original Webtoon <Webtoon kakao>](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EB%A7%88%ED%83%84%EC%9D%98-%EC%82%AC%EC%88%98/2470)

- [Official Thai Translation](https://th.kakaowebtoon.com/content/%E0%B8%AA%E0%B9%84%E0%B8%99%E0%B9%80%E0%B8%9B%E0%B8%AD%E0%B8%A3%E0%B9%8C%E0%B8%81%E0%B8%A3%E0%B8%B0%E0%B8%AA%E0%B8%B8%E0%B8%99%E0%B9%80%E0%B8%A7%E0%B8%97/179)
description.th:
ฮาลีฮา นักแม่นปืนแห่งทหารกองหนุนได้เกิดอุบัติเหตุระหว่างขนย้ายดินปืนในค่ายทหาร ทำให้เขาสูญเสียประสาทสัมผัส ของขาทั้งสองข้าง เดินไม่ได้ และต้องใช้เงินผ่าตัดเป็นจำนวนสองพันล้านวอน

หลังจากที่แม่ของเขาเห็นเขาเศร้า หมดอาลัยที่สูญเสียขา ทำให้เธอซื้อเครื่องเล่นเกมเสมือนจริงมาให้เขาเล่น ซึ่งใช้ในการหาเงินได้ด้วย เขารู้สึกดีใจมากที่ได้กลับมาเดินได้อีกครั้งแม้จะเป็นในเกม และเขาก็ได้ใช้ทักษะนักแม่นปืนของเขากับเกมนี้ด้วย

เขาหวังว่าจะสามารถหาเงินจากการเล่นเกมมาผ่าตัดขาตัวเองให้กลับมาเดินได้อีกครั้ง

description.es-la: ¡Una serie sobre un juego de fantasía hiperrealista! "Sargent Ha, loco bastardo. ¿Disparó otra ronda completa de tiros al blanco?" El francotirador Ha Lee Ha simplemente quería ser parte del ejército para siempre. Sin embargo, debido a un desafortunado accidente, quedó parapléjico y fue devuelto a la sociedad. El revolucionario juego de realidad virtual [Middle Earth] le presentó una nueva vida. ¡El dinero obtenido en [la Tierra Media] tiene valor en el mundo real! Sin embargo, ¡arruinó su oportunidad al seleccionar el personaje de nivel más bajo! "No soy como los demás. Esto es todo lo que tengo". Pólvora negra, bolas de hierro y baquetas ... ¡Les mostraré lo que es un verdadero 'mosquetero'!
description.pt-br:
Uma série sobre um jogo de fantasia hiper-realista!  
  
“Sargento Ha, seu louco bastardo. Você acertou todos os alvos outra vez?”  
  
O atirador Ha LeeHa simplesmente queria fazer parte do exército para sempre. No entanto, devido a um infeliz acidente, ele ficou paraplégico e foi jogado de volta à sociedade.  
  
O revolucionário jogo de realidade virtual [Terra Média] apresentou-lhe uma nova vida. O dinheiro obtido na [Terra Média] tem valor no mundo real! Ainda assim, ele arruinou sua chance ao selecionar o personagem de nível mais baixo!  
  
“Eu não sou como os outros. Isso é tudo que tenho.”  
  
Pólvora preta, bolas de ferro e varetas… Vou mostrar a todos o que é um verdadeiro ‘mosqueteiro’!

---
- [Original Webtoon <Webtoon kakao>](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EB%A7%88%ED%83%84%EC%9D%98-%EC%82%AC%EC%88%98/2470)

title.en: Sasada wa Okane de Oshi wo Daku

altTitles.en: Sasada Embraces Her Oshi with the Power of Money

altTitles.ja: ササダはオカネで推しを抱く

description.en:
*"Come on...! You want this, don't you? Here comes the donation!" [Cha-ching~!]*

Sasada Natsuko — an otaku living the hopeless existence of a wage slave for an abusive company.

What saved her was a streamer with an animated avatar — a VTuber — called Amano Amao. Knowing Amao's propensity to be turned on by money, Sasada shows her love in the form of AkaSupas (pricey donations) night after night!

But Amao's past life (real life person) is actually hiding a secret...?

A woman who works for the sake of the oshi who saved her, and a man who isn't making progress despite being her oshi.

The *virtual* and the *real* — does this love have any hope for crossplay!?

altTitles.ja: チュートリアルが死ぬほど難しい

description.en:
Lee Hojae had given up his life as a pro gamer, until one day he received a mysterious message: 

"Congratulations! You’ve been invited to the Tutorial World."

Intrigued, he enters the game and confidently chooses Hell difficulty, but soon learns that he is trapped there. With a mere 0.01% survival rate, Hojae must somehow overcome the game’s agonizing challenges to figure out the real reason he was invited.

This tutorial may be tough, but its secrets are what’s truly hellacious.
description.ja:
元プロゲーマーの堂山海は、ある日突然「チュートリアル」という名の異空間に招待された。 軽い気持ちで最凶クラスの難易度「ヘル」を選択してしまった彼は、離脱不可能、生存率ほぼゼロの「死にゲー」に挑むことになってしまった。 殺伐としたこの世界で生き残るために課せられたミッションをクリアしながら、チュートリアルに秘められた秘密を解き明かしていく。

description.ko:
gandara 퓨전 판타지 장편소설 '튜토리얼이 너무 어렵다' 가 웹툰으로 독자 여러분을 찾아갑니다.

삶이 무료하던 어느 날, 내 눈앞에 나타난 초대 메세지. 
[튜토리얼 세계에 입장하시겠습니까?] 

그리고 뒤이어 나타난 난이도 선택 창. 
[이지] [노말] [하드] [헬] 나는 주저없이 헬 난이도를 선택했다. 

그리고 후회했다. 

아무리 헬 난이도라지만, 이건 너무 심하잖아.

description.ru:
Однажды, посреди серых скучных будней, перед глазами появляется уведомление. [Вы хотите пройти обучение?]

За ним сразу же вылезло окно выбора сложности. [Лёгкая] [Обычная] [Сложная] [Адская]. Я без колебаний выбрал адскую сложность.

И пожалел.
Знаю, она называется адской, но это слишком.

altTitles.en: What a Catch of a Love Story!

altTitles.ja-ro: まさかな恋になりました｡

description.en:
Iwai Shiori (35), a woman past her prime. When a man named Date Mizuki (27) moves next door, her dreary, unchanging life is turned upside-down!
And the cause of this change... is the fact that she sees him as a fish!?
But ever since she spent the night with Date-kun, she starts seeing him as a handsome man every now and then...!? Shiori's love story rapidly unfolds!

An intense romantic comedy that'll have your heart racing!
description.ja: 冴えない栞(35)の隣に【魚男】が引っ越して来て、代わり映えのない毎日が激変!! 魚男が時々超絶イケメンに見えるのはなぜ――!? そして栞の恋が動き始める…

description.en:
A post-apocalyptic world is ruled by gods.

Driven by the desire to avenge his family, slain by a god, he plunged into the abyss of death. 

"O Void, lend me your power, The power to slay the gods…!"

altTitles.en: Nanjou-san Wants to Be Held by Me

altTitles.ja: 南條さんは僕に抱かれたい

altTitles.pt-br: Nanjou-san quer ser segurada por mim

description.en: From their worst encounter comes a story about their ultimate happiness! This romantic comedy explores the ups and downs of a serious relationship.
description.ja:
最低の出会いから始まる、
最高に幸せな二人の物語…!
ギャルとオタクの、
真面目なお付き合いラブコメです!

---

Saitei no deai kara hajimaru, 
saikō ni shiawasena futari no monogatari…! 
Gyaru to otaku no, 
majimena o tsukiai rabu komedesu!
description.pt-br: Do pior encontro deles surge uma história sobre sua felicidade final! Esta comédia romântica explora os altos e baixos de um relacionamento sério.

description.en:
Traversed and became the demoted prince, fortunately God did not let Qin Jun despair, activate the myth system!
All characters in mythology can be summoned!
The Monkey King who can shake the mountains and rivers with one stick! Clairvoyance and ears, insight into the world!
Buddha that holds people in the palm of hand, and no one can escape!
In this world of demons and gods, I vowed to be the strongest god emperor!
